answers.answer: You definitely need to ask the doctor that prescribed the meds for you if there are any issues in taking an herbal supplement. You don't want to risk something that might not interact well with what you're already taking.
a pharmacist is the better person to talk to you should know that self dosing with statin drugs can be trickey. the pharmacist will know the best dose as well.

question: hi , i hope someone can help , i am taking trazadonr 150mg...statins and metformin and gliclazide for my diabetes , i was wondering if i can take kalms on these pills i am VERY stressed right now , i am leaving my abusive partner after 20yrs i am very angry with everybody , i need something to take the edge off so i thought kalms
title: trazadone,statins and metformin
